item.content:encoded:
Minimalist Christmas | Simple Script Photo Holiday Card

Top 10! Minimalist Christmas | Simple Script Photo Holiday Card – Holiday Cards This item is trending! Simple Script Photo Holiday Card good product Simple Script Photo Holiday Card See more about itThis design features a single cherished photo. Choose a treasured memory from the past year, a family portrait, a special moment, a snapshot of your pet, or a more casual selfie. This simple design is made to match any photo of your choice. Underneath the photo, you can personalize the "Happy Holidays" greeting and the year, all in elegant sans-serif capitals. Aligned to the right, your family name is presented in signature-style script handwriting, adding a warm and personal touch. As you flip the card, you’ll find an earthy boho brown background decorated with a delicate white pine pattern. Ideal for those who appreciate a modern and minimalist design that still radiates warmth. Matching items are available in the collection linked on this page. Feel free to message me with any questions – I’ll be happy to help! Note I cannot modify an existing order. Browse our store for more unique Christmas photo cards. Price:$1.83
